pluginstrument.author: flyatr
pluginstrument.description:
Airspeed gauge for the Flight 1 ATR 72-500
V 1.11 - replaced jpg by png
V 1.10 - The bezel can now be hidden by clicking in the top left corner of the instrument - New graphics to match all of my ATR gauges - Bug fixes
V 1.00 - Works after battery is switched on - Adjustable speedbug uses the AUTOPILOT IAS setting. Adjustment is possible through gauge knob or FSX control assignment - Automatic speed bugs show V-speed limits based on the aircraft's weight and flaps setting (approach, go-around, take-off)
TAKE OFF - Yellow bug - V1 - White bug - VmLB0 (minimum speed for low bank turns at flaps 0) - Red bug - VmLB0 (icing conditions) - Green bug - VmHB0 (minimum speed for high bank turns at flaps 0, icing conditions)
LANDING - Yellow bug - VGA (go around speed) - White bug - VmLB0 (see above) - Red bug - VmLB0 (icing conditions) - Green bug - VmHB30 (minimum speed for high bank turns at flaps 30)
